title: RansomEye Signed Report
description: Frozen schema for signed, regulator-verifiable reports. All fields are mandatory. No optional fields allowed.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for this signed report (UUID v4)

assembled_explanation_id.description: Assembled explanation identifier (read-only reference to Explanation Assembly Engine)

view_type.description: View type from assembled explanation (exactly 4 types, no others)

format.description: Report format (exactly 3 formats: PDF for court/board, HTML for internal review, CSV for regulatory ingestion)

content_hash.description: SHA256 hash of canonical rendered output (bit-for-bit reproducible)

signing_key_id.description: Signing key identifier (export-verifiable, separate from Audit Ledger and Global Validator)

generated_at.description: RFC3339 UTC timestamp of report generation

rendering_profile_id.description: Rendering profile identifier (frozen, static templates, no logic)

audit_ledger_anchor.description: Audit ledger entry identifier anchoring this report generation
